# React Gesture Recognizers

## Install

```js
$ npm install react-gestures --save
```

## Usage

```js
	...
	render() {
		return (
			<ReactGestures
				onSwipeUp={...}
				onSwipeDown={...}
				onSwipeLeft={...}
				onSwipeRight={...}
				onTap={...}
				onTouchStart={...}
				onTouchMove={...}
				onTouchCancel={...}
				onTouchEnd={...}>
			<div>...</div>
			</ReactGestures>
		);
	}
}
```
